title.narrative: Provision of emergency shelter materials and non-food items to support flood and landslide-affected households

description.narrative: The main objective of this UNHCR project is to provide shelter and non-food items (NFI) to people internally displaced by floods and landslides in Uganda. UNHCR will procure shelter materials and NFI kits for 4,860 households and collaborate with the Ugandan Commissioner for Disaster Preparedness for the distribution to the affected people. The project will support 24,300 people, including 6,012 women and 6,138 girls, and the activities will be implemented within 3 months.
